description: Write a function that checks if an `ip_str` is an exact match for any string in the `ip_list`. `ip_list` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Match): is_ip_in_list("169.254.169.254", ["169.254.169.254", NULL]) -> 1. Example (No Match): is_ip_in_list("1.2.3.4", ["169.254.169.254", NULL]) -> 0.
